'''Gilles de Rais'''是日本的《[[eXceed]]》系列弹幕游戏及其衍生作品的登场角色之一。<s>元帅，你跑错片场了。</s>

==简介==
《[[eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-]]》，《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]》及《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE REX-]]》的登场角色。



==事迹==

《[[eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-]]》中的一面BOSS，《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]》及《[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE REX-]]》 中的五面BOSS。[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/EXceed]

===[[eXceed-GUN BULLET CHILDREN-]]===

{{Hide
|标题=英文原文
|内容=
Gilles de Rais is a creature of the night that is neither vampire, nor Gun Bullet Children. Her actions and motives are shrouded in mystery.

Her distinguishing feature are the artifact armor ‘Dole Gandis’ she wears that is similar to that of a medieval knight, and she wields a form of magic that was once thought to have been lost to history.<ref>[http://exceedseries.com/exceed-gbc_main/chrs_gb]</ref>
}}

Gilles de Rais 既不是吸血鬼也不是枪弹少女（Gun Bullet Children）.她的目的和行为始终是个迷。

她突出的特点是仿古铠甲'Dole Gandis'，她穿那个是因为它与一个中世纪的骑士很像，她使用出了一种一度被认为消失在历史中的魔法。

===[[eXceed 2nd-VAMPIRE-]]===

{{Hide
|标题=英文原文
|内容=
Gilles is a female sorcerer who uses alchemy to draw out and use the power of mystical artifacts. She seems to have a different agenda to either the vampires or the humans, but just what that agenda might be is known only to her.

Her personality consistently spiteful and sarcastic, and she is a dyed-in-the-wool sadist who enjoys seeing others in dire situations.
}}

Gilles是一个使用炼金术来取出和使用神秘古物的力量的女巫师。她看上去有着既不是人类也不是吸血鬼的种族，但到底是什么种族只有她自己知道。

她个性一贯地挖苦的，和她是一个骨子里的虐待狂，喜欢看别人在痛苦的环境里。
